channel.title: Changing interface texts
channel.description: So if I try to change quest interface text (id 190) normally I would simply change it's component text. However questlist in quest interface as well as "free/members, Progress, Difficulty" bar cannot be changed with that. So is there way to change text inside these interfaces without using buttonhandler and if(componentid == 2) or so? Or do I have to edit them inside cache somehow?

item.title: Changing interface texts
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

So if I try to change quest interface text (id 190) normally I would simply change it’s component text.
However questlist in quest interface as well as “free/members, Progress, Difficulty” bar cannot be changed with that. So is there way to change text inside these interfaces without using buttonhandler and if(componentid == 2) or so? Or do I have to edit them inside cache somehow?

Read full topic
